name: Spear of Despair
description:
Spear of Despair is a story-driven action platformer game about the knight named Velvet. After returning from a long trip, she found out that some losers are making game about her, and was invited to participate in its test. Too bad she didn't know that such a horrible fate awaits her...

A version you're playing right now is just a short demo of a future game. However, I still have plans to make a couple of updates for the demo, such as introducing gamepad support, tweaking balance and finishing some cut-out content. I hope you'll enjoy the game!

Join our discord channel: https://discord.gg/ZRqTKr4
